welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sutton in Ashfield, a charming town known for its rich history and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the hidden gems it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
